Articles.Content:
> 
> What is SpaceX launching today?

Communication satellite for Turkmenistan.

Edit: Well, only a 60 percent chance of launching today.

> 
> He is saying russia is a nice country so smash glasses on the wall.

I know, it just confused me.

> 
> Prepare hype train for ludicrous speed!

Too slow boss, we passed that awhile ago. there is no name for the speed were going so were using factors, we should be hype factor7.6 at this point

> 
> Is this the record for hype train threads?

We slaughtered the old record at 297 pages, back in .24
![Screenshot%202015-04-27%2010.21.45.png?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/vkpugdjruj70zqf/Screenshot%202015-04-27%2010.21.45.png?dl=0)hypeessss

> 
> Maxmaps tweeted- Crossing t's and dotting lower case j's, this has to be a clue!

Meh I bet it's Max just butchering the expression~ He's lovably bumbling at times ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> she canne take it captain.

What's the matter SpaceSphereOfDeath chicken???
Go HYPE!
Listening to NASA Hubble Documentary while hyping.

> 
> We must reach 88 pages per hour to release ksp 1.0!! Come on Marty Kerman!!

Most certain we've surpassed that.

> 
> [h=1]Server Migration[/h]Kerbal Space Program website is in maintenance mode while we are performing a Server Migration.
> 
> We appreciate your patience.
> 
> - Squad Team

I'm not special anymore. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Hypeee
FASTER!!! We must accelerate!!
Uhoh I got a bad gateway just there..
First bad gateway! nginx 1.8.0

> 
> I know, it just confused me.

The guy I replied to says it already Tuesday in Russia so I posted those lyrics from the song "Moskau"
Aaaaaaaaah
Bad gateway hype
Forum stopped responding for a few seconds. MOAR HYPE!

Got a bad gateway

1812 overture in full swing

Hype overloading

Average realise for KSP.

AAA!

Forums are bugging out!
Let the 502 errors commence!
Bad gateway here as well! Must mean something!

Warning core overload error code 502 repeat core overload error core 502

ERROR CAPITAL MESSAGE FAILURE
ohhh yea crashing the forums due to hype!!! hype factor 8
